WorkItem.ClosedComment: Doesn't repro for me. If this is specific to having Web Essentials installed, you'll have to file a bug with that component (we don't control the Web Essentials TypeScript features)
WorkItem.Description:
If module A imports module B and module B imports module A, and the compiler is invoked from within Visual Studio by the Web Essentials package, the compiler hangs up.

NOTE:
* this works fine from the command line.
* the compiler does not use any CPU at this point, so it is not an "infinite cycle".
* observed in AMD mode; did not try in CommonJS.
* since circular references will not actually work anyway, this is not a problem in itself, but I'm still reporting it here, because it could point to some bigger problem within the compiler; also, a meaningful error message would be nice. :-)
WorkItem.Summary: Compiler hangs up on circular module imports (0.9.0 beta)
